description: This graph represents the core functionality of a system that processes user queries, generates responses using a language model, and stores interaction history. The main flow involves receiving a query, retrieving relevant information, generating a response, and then saving the interaction.

components.name: QueryProcessor
components.description: Handles incoming user queries and prepares them for processing.
